heroSection.description: PayHere Referral Program allows you to earn an additional income by referring PayHere to your business networks & helping them to grow with PayHere.

steps.title: Join Program
description: Sign up to become a PayHere Referrer
Get a recommendation from an existing PayHere Merchant
Provide your bank account details to get rewarded

steps.title: Refer Friend
description: Spread the word about PayHere to your networks
Refer PayHere to businesses with online payment needs
Help your referred businesses to use PayHere

steps.title: Earn Points
description: Get your referrals confirmed once they become PayHere Merchants
Earn reward points for every payment they receive with PayHere
Redeem your reward points as cash

categories.title: PayHere Merchants
categories.description: If you use PayHere, you know firsthand how it can benefit other businesses

categories.title: Developers
categories.description: Refer PayHere to the businesses who get your development services

categories.title: Marketers
categories.description: Refer PayHere to the businesses who get your marketing services

questions.question: Do I need to be a PayHere Merchant to join the Program?
questions.answer: Contrary to popular belief, Lorem Ipsum is not simply random text. It has roots in a piece of classical Latin literature from 45 BC, making it over 2000 years old. Richard McClintock, a Latin professor at Hampden-Sydney College in Virginia, looked up one of the more obscure Latin words, consectetur, from a Lorem Ipsum passage, and going through the cites of the word in classical literature, discovered the undoubtable source. Lorem Ipsum comes from sections 1.10.32 and 1.10.33 of
(The Extremes of Good and Evil) by Cicero, written in 45 BC. This book is a treatise on the theory of ethics, very popular during the Renaissance. The first line of Lorem Ipsum,
, comes from a line in section 1.10.32.

questions.question: Do I need to be a PayHere Merchant to join the Program?
questions.answer: No, you can join the program without being a merchant.
